A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Visually Amazing\, but that doesnt make up for the absolute destruction of the story and horrible characters.  I understand you have to kill off the old guard\, but to turn all their characters into losers and then give them loser deaths is insulting to the fanbase.  There were so many other problems with the movie\, I can't even scratch the surface here.  Worst SW film ever\, that includes Phantom Menace.
